texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: A few days ago, I began to install a group of packages with up2date, and the person next to me was surprised that up2date even had this functionality. I use it regularly, but I realized that many users might not be familiar with it.
texts.text: A few days ago, I began to install a group of packages with up2date, and the person next to me was surprised that up2date even had this functionality. I use it regularly, but I realized that many users might not be familiar with it.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: You can install package groups using an at-sign (@) in front of the group name:
texts.text: You can install package groups using an at-sign (@) in front of the group name:

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: This will tell up2date to install all of the packages that are marked within the "X Window System" package group. That would include X drivers, the X libraries/binaries, and twm (among many other packages). If you're not sure which groups are available, just pass the
texts.text: This will tell up2date to install all of the packages that are marked within the "X Window System" package group. That would include X drivers, the X libraries/binaries, and twm (among many other packages). If you're not sure which groups are available, just pass the
